Class Carte

extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Carte​(Modele.CardName cardName)
    This is the class constructor which attribute name to a card and set the status of each card as inhand

      public boolean checkConditionHuntOfCards​(Modele.CardName c, Modele.JoueurAbs j, Modele.Partie p)
      Check the condition to see if a card can be played by the player
      Parameters:
      c - name of the card
      j - player who wish to use the card
      p - game
      Returns:
